high_rated_movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
high_rated_movies.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

high_rated_movies.title: The Godfather
high_rated_movies.description: An organized crime dynasty's aging patriarch transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

high_rated_movies.title: The Dark Knight
high_rated_movies.description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests.

high_rated_movies.title: Parasite
high_rated_movies.description: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy family and infiltrate their household by posing as unrelated, highly qualified individuals.

high_rated_movies.title: Spirited Away
high_rated_movies.description: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits.
